actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Lead-Based Paint Poisoning Prevention Act to permit grants thereunder to be made to a State agency in any case where local agencies are prevented by State law from receiving and expending such grants.

summary.text: Permits grants to be made under the Lead-Based Paint Poisoning Prevention Act to a State agency in any case where local agencies are prevented by State law from receiving and expending such grants. (Adds 42 U.S.C. 4844)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Lead-Based Paint Poisoning Prevention Act to permit grants thereunder to be made to a State agency in any case where local agencies are prevented by State law from receiving and expending such grants.
